title: [Minecraft] The Crystal Scar
body:
______________________

Hi summoners ! I'm a member of a build team in Minecraft and for one year we work on a new map called : **The Crystal Scar**. We have given ourselves the challenge to do a reproduction of the League of Legends map.
At the beginning we just expected to create a map who looks like but the more we advance more we wanted to reproduce the gamemode.

Today I wanted to show you our work, it's not finished, we will not release it before few weeks but have a look :

______________________
**THE CRYSTAL SCAR**

http://i.imgur.com/UkkBiuL.png

**Towers :**

* *The Refinery*
http://i.imgur.com/GBVSBwK.png

* *The Quarry*
http://i.imgur.com/wAeOwXd.png

* *The Boneyard*
http://i.imgur.com/XyaRc3d.png

* *The Drill*
http://i.imgur.com/3tz54FG.png

* *The Windmill*
http://i.imgur.com/X8PZ11E.png

**Middle :**

http://i.imgur.com/XPez0fW.png

**Blue Base (Red base is the same) :**

http://i.imgur.com/VmmVFUn.png

__________________

**FEATURE**

We also build a lobby, players can chooses their team, role and there is a tutorial room.
6 role are available : Support, Tank, Marksman, Mage, Assassin and Fighter. Every role have 4 spell and different attributes.

* *The Assassin :*
http://i.imgur.com/gLbL3B3.png
The **Assassin** is the most powerful class in **The Crystal Scar**, but he has to deal with the lowest health points. He is **black stuffed**, and has a **diamond sword**.

* *The Fighter :*
http://i.imgur.com/ly2OVji.png
The **Fighter** is the most polyvalent class in **The Crystal Scar**, his stats are like a vanilla player. He is **orange stuffed**, and has an** iron sword**.

* *The Mage :*
http://i.imgur.com/D4sOndP.png
The **Mage** is an elementalist in **The Crystal Scar**, he has crowd control and blast damage. He is **purple stuffed**, and has a **golden hoe**.

* *The Marksman :*
http://i.imgur.com/NC2n97L.png
The **Marksman** is the only range class in **The Crystal Scar**, but he has to deal with the lowest health points. He is **green stuffed**, and has a **bow**.

* *The Support :*
http://i.imgur.com/RGpkE0Q.png
The **Support** is the helper class in **The Crystal Scar**, he got more health point than usual but, he has weak damage. He is **yellow stuffed**, and has a **golden sword**.

* *The Tank :*
http://i.imgur.com/aThDQFS.png
The** Tank** is the most resistant class in **The Crystal Scar**, he got more health point than everyone but, he is slow. He is **gray stuffed**, and has a **Stone sword**.


 We build a shop, players can buy enchantment for their weapons, we took the items from League of Legends to illustrate :
http://i.imgur.com/92rFEbu.png

We also had sound, so when you capture a tower you can hear "The Blue Team has captured the Drill" and when a game starts the original music from The Crystal Scar is playing.

There are more feature but I will stop here for today, if you like it let us know ! we need support ! Thanks to pay attention !

*More screen of the map : *
https://imgur.com/a/PL7oi#0

EDIT: Wow i just woke up, thanks guys for those comment it means a lot for us !

UPDATE!
Hi guys, I'm sorry to taking so long to do this map. We want to do so much on the map for this can be perfect, but minecraft can't let us do what we want (thx java). Also one of our friend (redstone guy) have examen and can't help for the moment.
I'm gonna drop a cinematic video of the map, maybe.
Bye.

replies.body: This is amazing. Well done to you and your team.
Thanks a lot !

Capcom: "We don't see any Megaman fans."
https://31.media.tumblr.com/5c862e1aaded3fdf159e90b71aa518e4/tumblr_n705rdsngG1s18jubo1_500.jpg




Riot: "We don't see any Dominion fans."

...right...
This is so sick.
Thanks a lot !

I'll be honest.........................this looks better than the actual map.

Good work.
Ahaha, it was our goal :P

community working harder on dominion than riot :')
this is amazing

Man there are weeks that suck to be a Dominion player. Abandoned by Riot, crazy matchmaking full of people trolling (like seriously, 9 win streak 11 incredible loss streak, now 4 win streak, incredible lose streak again), stupid team comps.
And then I come to bards and see this. Awesome work man! Thank you for showing this awesome mode some love Riot does not give us.
Awesome work here. This definitely deserves high praise.
I think you guys just beat Minecraft and LoL at the same time.
This is AWESOME.  when it's finished Link plz ^^
Of course ! I hope we will see it on the front page the release day :D
Really cool.
Download please?
I think it's only fair that after you do summoners rift.
Yes, please! And Howling Abyss. It would be so awesome!

Great job so far.

You guys can probably add minion cycles and a gold system from Mob and player kills just buy using command blocks and scoreboards.

Thanks  !

We want to, but the map is already heavy for the server (because lot of clock). We will see that when everything else is finished (remember no promise!).

Riot needs to give their team thousands of RP for their efforts.

WHERE CAN I DOWNLOAD?!
Hehe, the download will be available when the map will be finished !

Wow. This is awesome. The shot of the windmill is amazing. You guys are doing an incredible job. 
Post again when it's all finished, would love to give it a a try!
Of course ! and thanks !
Get this thing on the roosterteeth megacraft videos so it can get more visibility! This map is awesome!
That could be awesome !

Gj, the map is amazing.

Suggestion: Make one for Summoner's Rift or Howling Abyss
It would mean a lot to me too :D

We stopped Minecraft construction for a while (you can check our channel [here](https://www.youtube.com/user/TeamMCFRArchitect) ) And while playing some League of Legends we decide to create this map for our come back.
We have two or three other project and maybe we will try to launch an another League of legends map ;-)
I'd prefer playing Dominion in the Minecraft version of the map instead of the original.
Are you still working on it? If yes, tell me what are you working on right now. Or you're probably just busy
That is amazing! :D
I don't even want to know the amount of time this took. Great job :D
Nice, great for league and minecraft fans
Awesome job.
Freaking Incredible.
DUDE THIS IS FREAKIN AMAZING!!!! I LOVE IT!
Wow, nice work. This took how long?
Thanks, we are on it since last year, this is pretty much yes ^^ .
wau...
Wow very nice!
Wow.
This is gorgeous. As a Dominion player I'm ecstatic to see a community creation like this giving our map some much needed love. Fantastic job you guys, you all rock!
Wow, this is great! Nicely done. n.n I can't wait to try this out.
It looks amazing simply amazing
Dayum bruh , That's O.P.
i think i would pay to see a TT and SR one to accompany this.
You are my new liege lord.
that's cool good job!
AWSOME! @.@
